source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.
source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts

items.title: Mandala stone art–Learn how to create geometric dot art
items.headline: Dive into the meditative experience of dotting a beautiful geometric pattern on a rock

How to utelize the meditative benefits of dot painting
What materials are best used for dot mandalas
